com.SocScore.framework.data

Class LeagueAnalysis

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.SocScore.framework.data.LeagueAnalysis

  • public class LeagueAnalysis
extends java.lang.Object
    Static class which stores the lists of Team and Match in the league, and performs operations on them.
    See Also:
    AnalysisViewer, BatchInput, LiveInput

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LeagueAnalysis()

      Loads a saved league (Lists of Team pr Match) from disk, and calls the reset methods on the lists' elements.

      Ranks (sorts) Team in the league by ID (increasing), score (decreasing), or total number of goals (decreasing).

    • Method Detail

      • addTeam

        public static void addTeam(Team team)
        Adds a new team to the league.
        Parameters:
        team - Team to be added to the league.

      • removeMatch

        public static void removeMatch(Match match)
        Removes (and deletes, unless passed to BatchInput) an existing Match from the league.
        Parameters:
        match - Match to remove from the league.

      • addMatch

        public static void addMatch(Match match)
        Adds a new Match to the league. Matches are generated by BatchInput and LiveInput.
        Parameters:
        match - Match to be added to the league.

      • removeTeam

        public static void removeTeam(Team team)
        Removes (and deletes) a Team from the league.
        Parameters:
        team - Team to be removed from the league.

      • findTeam

        public static Team findTeam(int ID)
                     throws java.lang.RuntimeException
        Finds a Team in the league by ID.
        Parameters:
        ID - ID of the team being searched for.
        Returns:
        Returns the team object if it is found.
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - Throws an exception if no team is found under the providedID.

      • rankLeague

        public static void rankLeague(TeamRankType type)
        Ranks (sorts) Team in the league by ID (increasing), score (decreasing), or total number of goals (decreasing).
        Parameters:
        type - Type of rank to apply to the league.

      • sortMatchesByID

        public static void sortMatchesByID()
        Sorts Match in the league by their ID (in increasing order).

      • sortMatchesByDate

        public static void sortMatchesByDate()
        Sorts Match in the league by their date (newest to oldest).

      • getMatchesForTeam

        public static java.util.List getMatchesForTeam(int teamID)
                                        throws java.lang.RuntimeException
        Finds and aggregates all Match in the league that have been played by the inputted Team.
        Parameters:
        teamID - ID of the team to find matches for.
        Returns:
        Returns an ArrayList of all matches played by the team.
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - Throws an exception if no matches could be found for the team.

      • findMatch

        public static Match findMatch(int ID)
                       throws java.lang.RuntimeException
        Finds a Match in the league by its ID.
        Parameters:
        ID - ID of the match being looked for.
        Returns:
        Returns the Match object if it is found.
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - Throws an exception if the match with the ID provided can't be found.

      • saveLeagueToDisk

        public static void saveLeagueToDisk()
                             throws java.lang.RuntimeException
        Saves league (Lists of Team and Match) to the disk.
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - Throws an exception if there are still matches being managed by BatchInput or LiveInput, as those are not stored to the disk by this method.

      • loadLeagueFromDisk

        public static void loadLeagueFromDisk()
        Loads a saved league (Lists of Team pr Match) from disk, and calls the reset methods on the lists' elements. This is done to restore object links in the matches, teams, and players.
        See Also:
        Team.resetPlayers(), Match.resetTeams()

      • getLeague

        public static java.util.List getLeague()
        Returns:
        Returns an ArrayList of every Team present in the league, in the order it was last sorted in.
        See Also:
        rankLeague(TeamRankType), sortMatchesByID(), sortMatchesByDate()

      • getMatches

        public static java.util.List getMatches()
        Returns:
        Returns an ArrayList of every Match present in the league. Note that this does not include matches currently being edited by BatchInput or LiveInput.
